remarks: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation (special case where the generation function is expressed in maps-to notation).  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)  (Revised by Scott Fenton, 2-Nov-2011.)
statement:
frsucmpt.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
frsucmpt.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
frsucmpt.3 $e |- F/_ x D $.
frsucmpt.4 $e |- F = ( rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) |` _om ) $.
frsucmpt.5 $e |- ( x = ( F ` B ) -> C = D ) $.
frsucmpt $p |- ( ( B e. _om /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) $.
